description: This PHP script handles setting IP configurations (IPv4 and IPv6) on a device, based on input received via an HTTP request. It updates device network settings, manages DHCP configurations, and restarts services where necessary.

methods.name: setStr
methods.description: Sets a specific device configuration setting identified by a string key.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves the current value of a device configuration setting identified by a string key.

methods.name: shell-exec
methods.description: Executes a shell command on the server and returns the output.
